snippet.title: PlayStation Classic | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Introducing PlayStation Classic, a miniaturised version of the original PS console which comes with 20 preloaded games, including Final Fantasy VII, Tekken 3 and Wild Arms.

PlayStation Classic launches on 3rd December. Here’s everything you need to know: http://play.st/2MJTlGD
